q1.question: An bhfuil LegacyGuard sl√°n?

Bainimid √∫s√°id as cripti√∫ √≥ cheann go ceann agus as ailtireacht n√°id-iontaoibhe, rud a chialla√≠onn nach f√©idir le duine neamh√∫daraithe ar bith rochtain a fh√°il ar do chuid sonra√≠, n√≠ fi√∫ sinne. q4.question: Cad √© an difr√≠ocht idir an 'Cruinneach√°n' agus an 'L√°mhleabhar'?
